subject: RE: [junit] My world is realer than your world
msgSnippet: ... Well, at least points a number of people agree that they perceive them to be real... ;) Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
> As for the "sloppiest" part, about forty people have commented on my
> post so far, and a lot of them with experiences confirming my
> observations. Maybe you find it sloppy, but I suggest you look beyond
> the form, because there are obviously some real points in there...

Well, at least points a number of people agree that they perceive them to be
real... ;)

Cheers, Ilja
